claim: NASA confirms Earth will go dark for 6 days!
label: fake
reference_answer: NASA has never made such a claim. This is a widely circulated hoax that has been debunked multiple times.

claim: WHO declares monkeypox a global health emergency.
label: real
reference_answer: In July 2022, the World Health Organization declared monkeypox a public health emergency of international concern.

claim: COVID-19 vaccines contain microchips to track people.
label: fake
reference_answer: There is no evidence to support this conspiracy theory. COVID-19 vaccines are medically approved and do not contain microchips.

claim: India successfully lands Chandrayaan-3 near the Moon's south pole.
label: real
reference_answer: On August 23, 2023, ISRO's Chandrayaan-3 successfully landed on the lunar south pole, making India the first country to do so.

label: fake
reference_answer: There is no scientific basis for this claim. Viruses cannot be transmitted by radio waves or mobile networks.
